children.text: The True Cost of Self-Hosted Redirect Infrastructure

Maintaining Apache or Nginx redirect servers creates ongoing security risk, requires manual SSL certificate management, and generates constant DevOps tickets. RedirHub provides enterprise-grade redirect infrastructure as a service—reducing attack surfaces, eliminating maintenance burden, and cutting certificate management costs by 70%.
Enterprise Infrastructure Features
99.99% uptime SLA with global edge network architecture
Sub-100ms redirect response times from anywhere in the world
Automatic zero-touch SSL/TLS certificate provisioning and renewal
Advanced wildcard subdomain support (*.yourdomain.com)
Path and query string preservation for seamless migrations
Redirect chain detection and prevention for SEO optimization
Developer-First Automation
RESTful API for programmatic redirect management and CI/CD integration
Official Terraform provider for infrastructure-as-code workflows
Bulk CSV import/export for migrating 10,000+ URLs with zero errors
Webhook notifications for redirect failures and SSL expiry alerts
Enterprise Security & Compliance
Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) with SSO integration (Okta, Auth0)
Comprehensive audit logs with 90+ day retention for compliance
Team collaboration with granular permissions per domain or project
SOC 2 Type II compliant infrastructure with enterprise SLA
Granular Analytics & Monitoring

Transform redirect traffic into actionable intelligence. Track visitor geography, referrer sources, device types, browser statistics, and HTTP status codes. Real-time dashboards provide instant visibility into redirect performance, while detailed logs integrate with Splunk, Datadog, and other monitoring platforms.
Proven Use Cases
M&A domain integration: Migrate 150+ acquired domains without outages
Site rebranding: Seamlessly redirect traffic from old .io to new .com domain
Marketing campaign URLs: Decouple marketing from engineering dependencies
Defensive typosquatting: Protect brand equity by redirecting common misspellings
Legacy URL support: Maintain backwards compatibility during platform migrations

faqs.question: How does RedirHub compare to Cloudflare Page Rules for redirect management?
faqs.answer: Cloudflare Page Rules cap at 3 (free) or 125 (enterprise) rules and lack bulk management, redirect-specific analytics, or audit logs. RedirHub is purpose-built for redirect infrastructure: unlimited redirects, bulk CSV operations, team permissions with RBAC, comprehensive per-redirect analytics, and a dedicated Terraform provider.

faqs.question: Does RedirHub support wildcard subdomain redirects?
faqs.answer: Yes. RedirHub supports wildcard subdomain patterns—for example, *.yourdomain.com redirecting to a single destination—with full path and query string preservation. This covers entire subdomain families in one rule, which is critical for large-scale platform migrations or multi-tenant SaaS routing.

faqs.question: What uptime SLA does RedirHub offer?
faqs.answer: Enterprise plans include a 99.99% uptime SLA backed by a global edge network. Redirects are processed at the network edge—not a single origin server—with automatic regional failover. This removes the single point of failure inherent in self-hosted Apache or Nginx configurations.

faqs.question: How do SSO and RBAC work for enterprise teams?
faqs.answer: RedirHub integrates with SAML 2.0 and OAuth 2.0 providers including Okta, Auth0, Azure AD, and Google Workspace. SSO setup typically completes in under a day. Role-based access control assigns per-domain or per-project permissions, so marketing can manage campaign URLs independently without touching infrastructure domains. Every change is captured in audit logs.

faqs.question: Can I manage redirects programmatically via API or Terraform?
faqs.answer: Yes. RedirHub provides a RESTful API for creating, updating, and deleting redirects programmatically—including bulk operations that handle thousands of changes in a single call. The official Terraform provider enables full infrastructure-as-code workflows, letting you manage redirect rules alongside your existing cloud infrastructure.

faqs.question: Can we use RedirHub to provision SSL for our customers' custom domains?
faqs.answer: Yes. RedirHub's API handles automatic SSL certificate provisioning for custom domains at scale—including thousands of customer domains simultaneously. This avoids Let's Encrypt rate limiting issues and eliminates the manual provisioning overhead that typically blocks SaaS platforms from offering custom domain support.

faqs.question: What happens if a redirect fails or there's a service disruption?
faqs.answer: RedirHub's edge network automatically routes around failures with instant regional failover. Webhook notifications alert you in real time to any 4xx/5xx errors. Logs integrate with Splunk, Datadog, and other monitoring platforms. The 99.99% SLA applies to the full global network, not just a single region.

faqs.question: Do you provide migration support when moving from a legacy redirect server?
faqs.answer: Yes. Enterprise plans include dedicated onboarding and migration assistance. Our team reviews existing redirect mappings, helps plan the bulk import, and monitors traffic throughout the cutover. Priority support is available via Slack or Microsoft Teams—not just ticket queues.
